text: George Ho Ho-chi, GBS, OBE, JP (3 November 1919 â€“ 4 June 2014) was a Hong Kong media mogul. He was the son of Hong Kong businessman Robert Hotung. Ho was the founder of the Commercial Radio Hong Kong and Commercial Television. He still kept the title of honorary chairman when he died on 4 June 2014. He received the Gold Bauhinia Star award in 2001. ==References== Category:1918 births Category:2014 deaths Category:Hong Kong businesspeople Category:Chinese businesspeople
title: George Ho
